game_description: Train your reaction skills in multiple game modes and tweaks training settings to fit your skill level. Prove your skills by competing in leaderboards. Do you have what it takes to be number #1 goalienator in virtual reality? GAME FEATURES - Game modes similiar to hockey and other casual sport-like activities (*) - Keep track of your goaltender progress (shots against, total saves, glove saves, blocker saves etc.) - Training mode with unique gameplay elements and options to tweak - Challenge mode, challenge other players in leaderboard rankings and collect achievements - Customize color of your catcher glove, blocker and goalie stick * Goalienator is not designed to be realistic sport simulator, but casual goaltending game with familiar elements from different sports
review_1: This game is so good but it would be 10 times better if you added leg pads.
review_2: I’m a goalie and I used to play a game on steam. I don’t have space where my computer is anymore, so I haven’t been able to play in over a year. I just discovered this today and couldn’t be happier! This is amazing that it’s free. It’s nearly all the same stuff as sense arena, but free! This is perfect for training, and no more computer. Just what I needed, thank you so much.
review_3: My absolute favorite game! It is a great workout and you will break a sweat. The challenges are super fun and there is enough variety to keep you coming back. I would love if they added a gameplay where you’re actually in a game! The breakaways are really fun but get a little old so an actual game would be so amazing!!
review_4: My game wont load. Its stuck on the title screen and all it says is "loading, please wait, [STATUS!] ACCOUNT VALIDATION FOR MC-FLEIRY" Anyone know how to fix it?
review_5: I think the other star that it’s missing is because of one game mode they need to add and that’s where you get to be a goalie in a game and not just challenges. A career mode would be awesome to and that would get u guys that 5 star everything else is great
